Metadata.title: Iury Lenon | Web Performance & Business Automation
Metadata.description: Helping businesses reduce costs and scale through Custom Web Platforms, Private Cloud Infrastructure, and AI Automation. Your Strategic Tech Partner in London.
Metadata.keywords: Business Automation, Web Performance, Private Cloud, Next.js Expert, n8n Automation, Tech Consultant London

HomePage.subtitle: Helping ambitious companies in the UK and worldwide to scale their digital infrastructure, reduce operational costs, and automate complex workflows.

FeatureSection.subtitle: YOUR STRATEGIC PARTNER
FeatureSection.title: Engineering that drives revenue and efficiency
FeatureSection.description: I don't just write code; I build the digital foundation your business needs to grow. From custom platforms to automated workflows, I deliver solutions that you own and control.
FeatureSection.feature1: High-Performance Web Platforms (Next.js) designed for SEO dominance and maximum conversion
FeatureSection.feature2: Private Cloud Infrastructure (VPS) to ensure data privacy and cut recurring SaaS fees
FeatureSection.feature3: AI & Workflow Automation (n8n) to scale your operations without increasing headcount.

ServicesSection.subtitle: Services
ServicesSection.title: Web Platforms, Automation & Infrastructure
ServicesSection.description: I provide tailored digital solutions that drive business growth, reduce operational costs, and improve efficiency.
ServicesSection.service1_desc: Custom-coded sites designed to rank #1 on Google and convert visitors into customers. No slow builders like Wix/Wordpress.
ServicesSection.service2_desc: From idea to market. Robust web applications with secure login, payments, and dashboards for startups.
ServicesSection.service3_desc: Connect your apps (CRM, Email, Slack). Automate repetitive tasks using n8n and AI, saving 20+ hours per week.
ServicesSection.service4_desc: Your own private server (VPS). We manage security, backups, and updates so you can focus on your business.

CtaSection.title: Stop losing time with manual tasks and slow websites
CtaSection.description_1: Let's build a digital infrastructure that works for you 24/7.

Hero.description: Based in London, serving ambitious businesses worldwide. I bridge the gap between complex engineering, business automation, and tangible growth.

Bio.title: Engineering with a Business Mindset
Bio.p1: My journey into software engineering wasn't just about learning syntax; it was about solving real-world inefficiencies. I specialize in building end-to-end solutions that don't just "work", but actively reduce costs and increase revenue.
Bio.p2: I move beyond the traditional "freelancer" role. I act as an architect for your digital infrastructure. Whether it's a high-performance web platform that ranks #1 on Google, or a private automation server (VPS) that eliminates expensive SaaS fees, my goal is to give you ownership and control over your technology.
Bio.p3: With fluency in English, Portuguese, and Spanish, I bring a global perspective to every project, ensuring seamless communication with international teams and clients. I am here to be the technical partner who helps your business scale.

Skills.title: Enterprise-Grade Technology Stack
Skills.description: I use a modern, robust toolkit designed for scalability, security, and long-term maintainability.

Hero.title: Case Studies & Solutions
Hero.description: Real-world examples of high-performance web platforms and intelligent automations that reduce costs, save time, and drive business growth.

Projects.p1_desc: A full-scale digital infrastructure for a premium clinic. Features a Headless CMS (Sanity) for real-time content management, a hybrid E-commerce system for selling products & treatments, and sub-second performance.
Projects.p2_desc: A feature-rich portfolio & blog system. Includes a custom Admin Dashboard for content management, Google OAuth for secure access, and a dual-language architecture (i18n). Built for high performance and SEO.
Projects.p3_desc: An intelligent automation infrastructure. It captures leads, validates data with Zod, enriches profiles using AI Agents, and instantly notifies the sales team via Slack/WhatsApp, eliminating manual data entry.

Hero.title: Solutions for Growth & Efficiency
Hero.description: Comprehensive technical services designed to build high-performance web platforms, reduce operational costs with private infrastructure, and automate manual workflows.

List.s1_subtitle: Custom-coded platforms designed to rank #1 on Google and convert visitors into revenue. No slow builders like Wix or Wordpress.
List.s1_d1: Built with Next.js for instant loading speeds (100/100 Lighthouse).
List.s1_d2: Technical SEO architecture ensuring maximum visibility.
List.s1_d3: Integration with CRMs (HubSpot, Pipedrive) and marketing tools.
List.s2_subtitle: Turn your startup idea into a robust product. Secure, scalable web applications built for growth.
List.s2_d1: Secure user authentication and role-based access control.
List.s3_subtitle: Stop wasting time on manual tasks. We connect your apps and automate workflows using AI and n8n.
List.s3_d1: Automate repetitive tasks (Data Entry, Invoicing, Emails).
List.s3_d2: Connect disparate apps (e.g., Typeform ‚Üí OpenAI ‚Üí Slack).
List.s3_d3: Intelligent workflows powered by AI agents.
List.s3_d4: Reduction of human error and operational costs.
List.s4_subtitle: Your own Private Cloud. We host, secure, and maintain your infrastructure so you can focus on your business.
List.s4_d1: Setup of Private VPS in the UK/Europe (GDPR Compliant).
List.s4_d2: Massive cost reduction compared to SaaS tools (Zapier/Make).

Hero.title: Let's Build Your Digital Future
Hero.description: Ready to scale your business? Whether you need a high-performance web platform, custom automation, or secure infrastructure, I'm here to help you engineer the solution.

Form.title: Get in Touch
Form.description: I'm currently available for freelance opportunities and open to discussing new projects. Feel free to reach out directly or connect with me on social media.
Form.message_placeholder: Tell me about your project goals, timeline, or current challenges...

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes how Iury Lenon (operating as a Sole Trader in the United Kingdom) collects, uses, and shares your personal information when you visit iurylenon.com. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring your data is handled in compliance with the UK GDPR and the Data Protection Act 2018.
PrivacyPolicy.s1_desc: We collect information that you voluntarily provide to us via our contact forms and technical data necessary for the site operation:
PrivacyPolicy.s1_l1: Contact Data: Name, email address, and phone number provided in the contact form.
PrivacyPolicy.s1_l2: Business Data: Project details and requirements you share in your message.
PrivacyPolicy.s1_l3: Technical Data: IP address, browser type, and device information (collected anonymously for security and analytics).
PrivacyPolicy.s2_desc: We use this data strictly for business purposes:
PrivacyPolicy.s2_l1: To respond to your inquiries and provide technical quotes.
PrivacyPolicy.s2_l2: To execute the services requested (Web Development & Automation).
PrivacyPolicy.s2_l3: To comply with legal obligations (e.g., tax and accounting).
PrivacyPolicy.s3_desc: We do not sell your data. We only share data with trusted third-party service providers necessary to run our infrastructure:
PrivacyPolicy.s4_desc: Under the UK GDPR, you have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. To exercise these rights, please contact us at contact@iurylenon.com.

TermsOfService.title: Terms of Service
TermsOfService.s1_desc: By accessing iurylenon.com, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. These terms apply to all visitors, users, and others who access or use the Service provided by Iury Lenon (the "Service Provider").
TermsOfService.s2_desc: The Site and its original content (including code structure, design, text, and graphics) are the exclusive property of Iury Lenon and are protected by the copyright laws of the United Kingdom and international treaties. You may not reproduce or redistribute any part of this site without express written permission.
TermsOfService.s3_desc: In no event shall Iury Lenon be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with your use of the website. The services are provided "as is" and "as available".
TermsOfService.s4_desc: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of England and Wales. Any disputes relating to these terms will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of England and Wales.
TermsOfService.s5_desc: For any questions regarding these Terms, please contact us at contact@iurylenon.com.

CookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
CookiePolicy.s1_desc: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They are standard in the industry and help us make the website work efficiently and provide analytics on site performance.
CookiePolicy.s2_l1: Essential Cookies: These are strictly necessary for the website to function (e.g., security headers, session states). You cannot opt-out of these.
CookiePolicy.s2_l2: Analytics Cookies: We use tools like Vercel Analytics to understand anonymous visitor behavior (e.g., which pages are most popular). This data does not identify you personally.
CookiePolicy.s3_desc: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings preferences. You can choose to block or delete cookies, but this may affect the functionality of some parts of the site.
CookiePolicy.s4_desc: If you have questions about our use of cookies, please email contact@iurylenon.com.

HelpPage.for_draft_success: ‚úÖ Post saved as draft (only you can see it)

HelpPage.preview_how_to: üîç How to view drafts before publishing
HelpPage.preview_step2: 2. Copy the post "slug" (URL field in Studio)
HelpPage.preview_example: Example: If the slug is "my-first-post", the URL will be:
HelpPage.preview_tip: üí° Tip: When in preview mode, you'll see a yellow banner at the top of posts.
HelpPage.trouble_post_missing_l1: ‚Ä¢ Check if "Published At" is filled in
HelpPage.trouble_post_missing_l2: ‚Ä¢ Wait a few seconds and refresh the page
HelpPage.trouble_preview_broken_l1: ‚Ä¢ Check if the slug is correct in the URL
HelpPage.trouble_preview_broken_l2: ‚Ä¢ Confirm the post was saved in Studio
HelpPage.trouble_preview_broken_l3: ‚Ä¢ Try accessing the post normally first
